com.yberry.dinehawaii.customview.CustomT.android:text: ATTENTION : No Show time has elapsed, push NO-SHOW button to give a 10 min extension while it is blinking or push CLOSE RESERVATION button to close this reservation.

ATTENTION : This reservation is under waiting, make available this reservation for the request date, time and party size.
